sponsor: Pfizer's Upjohn has merged with Mylan to form Viatris Inc.
briefTitle: This Study is An Open-Label Trial Of Pregabalin In Patients With Fibromyalgia
officialTitle: A 12 Week, Open-Label, Safety Trial Of Pregabalin In Patients With Fibromyalgia
summary: The main purpose of this protocol is to evaluate the long-term safety of pregabalin in patients who participated in the previous fibromyalgia Study A0081100 and who wish to receive open-label pregabalin therapy.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline to Week 4 in Pain Visual Analog Scale (VAS) Score
